actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Dazzling Display then one Bite and one Claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d10+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dazzling Display
actions.desc: Causes its chrome scales to ripple casting dizzying reflections of light. Each creature that can see the chroma lizard must make DC 15 Con save or be blinded until the end of its next turn. The lizard can't use this action while in darkness and creatures have advantage on the save if the chroma lizard is in dim light.

special_abilities.name: Mirror Scales
special_abilities.desc: While the chroma lizard is in bright light creatures that rely on sight have disadvantage on attack rolls vs. the lizard.

special_abilities.name: Mirror Shy
special_abilities.desc: If the chroma lizard sees itself reflected in a polished surface within 30' of it and in an area of bright light the lizard immediately closes its eyes and is blinded until the start of its next turn when it can check for the reflection again.

special_abilities.name: Radiant Reflection
special_abilities.desc: When a creature deals radiant to the chroma lizard half the radiant the lizard took is reflected back at that creature.
